about.intro: I'm 25 years old, born in Kyiv, Ukraine and now living in sunny Valencia, Spain ☀️. I'm a JavaScript developer and speak four languages: Russian, Ukrainian, English, and Spanish. I've visited 20 countries, over 90 cities, and lived in four countries.
about.eduGoIT: GoIT — FullStack Developer, July 2024 – May 2025 Kyiv, Ukraine
about.eduMaster: Master's, NTUU 'KPI', Electronics, Sep 2022 – Jan 2024 Kyiv, Ukraine
about.eduBachelor: Bachelor's, NTUU 'KPI', Electronics, Sep 2018 – Jun 2022 Kyiv, Ukraine
about.eduLyceum: Polytechnic Lyceum of KPI, Sep 2007 – May 2018 Kyiv, Ukraine
about.hobbies: I’m into everything related to driving and cars — I’ve had a couple of car-related projects, and I love being behind the wheel. I also enjoy active leisure, sports, adventure, and anything with a bit of adrenaline. I appreciate meaningful conversations, good vibes, and making the most out of every moment.
about.sport: Sports have always played a big role in my life. I started with professional swimming, then moved into rowing. I’ve also practiced tennis, and during winter I really enjoy skiing and snowboarding.
about.cat: I have a cat. His name is Murchyk. He is very nice.
about.catLinkText: Click here to visit Murchyk's page
about.goals: I want to travel even more — next on my list are Barcelona, Madrid, Paris, Rome, and Finland. I'm always looking for new experiences, people, and moments that inspire. If you’d like to support me — feel free to invite me or even send a little travel fund 🙂

cookie.text: We use cookies to improve your experience. By continuing to use the site, you agree to this.
